```{r old work}
get_tweets <- function(q, geocode){
  temp <- search_tweets2(q = q, n = 18000, include_rts = FALSE, geocode = lookup_coords(geocode)) 
  temp2 <- temp %>%
    select(created_at, text, query) %>%
    mutate(location = geocode,
         eastern_time = with_tz(created_at, tzone = "America/New_York"))
  temp2$new_time <- as.POSIXct(trunc(temp2$eastern_time, "mins"))
  return(temp2)
}

sentimentize_tweets <- function(x){
  temp <- unnest_tokens(x, "word", text) %>%
    inner_join(get_sentiments("afinn")) %>%
    group_by(new_time) %>% summarise(sentiment = sum(score))
  return(temp)
}

test <- get_tweets(q = "Bruins OR Leafs", geocode = "Boston")
test2 <- sentimentize_tweets(test) %>%
  filter(new_time >= mdy_hms("4/25/2018 19:00:00", tz = "America/New_York"),
         new_time <= mdy_hms("4/25/2018 23:00:00", tz = "America/New_York"))

ggplot(data = test2, aes(x = new_time, y = sentiment, group = 1)) + geom_line()+ geom_point() +
  labs(main = "Twitter Sentiment of Bruins vs. Leafs", sentiment = "@AlexNovet", x = "Time (Eastern)", y = "Total Tweet Sentiment")+ 
  theme_few()
            
```
